input.sentences: we all went to the convention center for the event tonight .
there were a lot of people already there .
they had a lot of tasty food to eat .
we met a lot of new people .
some received awards throughout the night .
output.sentences: Tonight an event was being held at the convention center.
We expected a lot of people to attend.
Rita was surprised to find a lot of tasty food being served.
We met a lot of people, including Frederick Wright who was recognized during the award ceremony for a Scientific achievement.
Also we met Sharon Blacksmith who won the most awards on this night.
